alert.note: Alert for Logan; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:46PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Thomas and northeastern Logan Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 546 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm producing a landspout 10 miles north of Winona, or 12 miles south of Levant, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Thomas and northeastern Logan Counties, including the following locations... Mingo. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 44 and 65. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
